message.content:
At the first stop, half of the students, or 48 / 2 = <<48/2=24>>24 students get off the bus.
This leaves 48 - 24 = <<48-24=24>>24 students on the bus.
At the second stop, another half of the students get off, leaving 24 / 2 = <<24/2=12>>12 students on the bus.
At the third stop, half of the remaining students get off, leaving 12 / 2 = <<12/2=6>>6 students on the bus. Answer: \boxed{6}.
